Items.Title: Oversight: Guidance Services for Students.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report information regarding guidance counselors and social workers in schools.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to report information regarding guidance counselors and social workers in schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a comprehensive college preparation program, based on the college readiness model proposed by the Urban Youth Collaborative, to improve and expand college access for all students.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a comprehensive college preparation program.

Items.Title: Oversight: Guidance Services for Students.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report information regarding guidance counselors and social workers in schools.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to report information regarding guidance counselors and social workers in schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a comprehensive college preparation program, based on the college readiness model proposed by the Urban Youth Collaborative, to improve and expand college access for all students.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a comprehensive college preparation program.
